    The main SemRep factuality pipeline.

    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • convertScalarModalityValueToFactuality

        public static Modification convertScalarModalityValueToFactuality​(Predication predication)
        Extracts the factuality value from a predication and generates the corresponding Modification object.
        Parameters:
        predication - the input predication
        Returns:
        the factuality Modification object encapsulating the input predication

      • convertScalarModalityValueToFactualityValue

        public static java.lang.String convertScalarModalityValueToFactualityValue​(Predication predication)
        Extracts the factuality value of a predication as a string. The value is one of the following: Fact, Probable, Possible, Doubtful, Counterfact, or Uncommitted.
        Parameters:
        predication - the input predication
        Returns:
        the factuality value of the predication as a string

      • writeReadable

        public static void writeReadable​(Document document,
                                 java.lang.String readableOutFileName)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a human-readable outout of the document, similar to SemRep's full-fielded output.
        Parameters:
        document - the processed document
        readableOutFileName - the output file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the output file

      • writeStandoff

        public static void writeStandoff​(Document document,
                                 java.lang.String annOutFileName)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes standoff annotation output of the document.
        Parameters:
        document - the processed document
        annOutFileName - the output file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the output file

      • annotateIndicators

        public static void annotateIndicators​(Document document,
                                      java.util.LinkedHashSet<Indicator> indicators)
                               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                      java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Annotates factuality triggers in a document. If an entity or another trigger has already been annotated to subsume the trigger, the trigger is not annotated.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to annotate
        indicators - the factuality triggers
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if trigger annotation class is not found
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the trigger annotation class cannot be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with access to trigger annotation class

      • process

        public static void process​(Document document,
                           java.util.LinkedHashSet<Indicator> indicators,
                           java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules)
                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                           java.lang.InstantiationException
        Processes a single Document with the Embedding Framework.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to process
        indicators - the set of factuality triggers to use
        rules - the list of argument identification rules to use
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there is a problem with indicator annotator class
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with indicator annotation
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with indicator annotation

      • processDirectory

        public static void processDirectory​(java.lang.String inDirName,
                                    java.lang.String annOutDirName,
                                    java.lang.String readableOutDirName,
                                    java.util.LinkedHashSet<Indicator> indicators,
                                    java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                    java.lang.InstantiationException
        Processes a directory of XML files and writes the output of the pipeline as standoff annotation and as human-readable output. To incorporate SemRep information, it also uses as input the corresponding full-fielded SemRep output file.
        Parameters:
        inDirName - the XML input directory
        annOutDirName - the standoff annotation output directory
        readableOutDirName - the human-readable output directory
        indicators - the set of factuality triggers to use
        rules - the list of argument identification rules to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there is a problem with indicator annotator class
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with indicator annotation
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with indicator annotation

      • loadFactualityIndicators

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<Indicator> loadFactualityIndicators​(java.lang.String filename)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                          nu.xom.ParsingException,
                                                                          nu.xom.ValidityException
        Loads factuality triggers from a file defined in properties.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file with the indicators
        Returns:
        the set of factuality triggers
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if properties file cannot be found
        nu.xom.ParsingException - if indicator file cannot be parsed
        nu.xom.ValidityException - if the indicator file is not valid

      • initSemRepDefinitions

        public static void initSemRepDefinitions​()
        Initializes SemRep relation definitions.

      • getXMLReader

        public static XMLReader getXMLReader​()
        Initializes the XML readers for SemRep semantic items.
        Returns:
        an XML reader that can read relevant semantic items.

      • getAnnotationTypes

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getAnnotationTypes​()
        Initializes the input annotation types to SemRep entity/relation types.
        Returns:
        a Map of semantic item classes and the corresponding subtypes.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
